title: Someone was asking about ADC Ahri
body:
Adc Ahri is a couple things, but it has many downsides. It was more of a challenge to play it that way and i find it fun.

The q does do some damage, and does do true damage, but no spells have any ad scaling. The main gist of it is nomally to play it top.

You run ad runes with hybrid pen and armor seals, and i typically run cdr glyphs.

Most top laners will be mellee and few ranged, but ahris range is pretty decent.

The gimmick is simple. Get big ad, farm easy, and harass a ton.

Literally everytime he goes to cs, free harass.  If they try to engage on you, charm for some free q + w+auto dmg, and just trade freely. 

The other part to that gimmick is your ult. While you have no ad scaling or steroids, you still have her high mobility, allowing for easy roams mid for ult+charm kills to get you fed.

I have beaten several renektons top(which is funny) and many other champs which frequent top with this.

It does lose(obv, it's a dumb build), but it definitely wins too.
